booking.topRule1: A booking can only be made 24h in advance
booking.topRule2: You can train a maximum of 2 hours at a time
booking.error1: You must select at least one booking!

bookingConfirmation.adminsInfo: You can get a key from the following people:

rules.title: Rules for Using the Sports Room
rules.rule1: The gym is exclusive to residents of dormitories located at Gret-Palucca-Street 9 and 11.
rules.rule2: Ensure your shoes are clean before use.
rules.rule5: Maintain cleanliness of the walls. Avoid leaning weights or yourself against them.
rules.rule6: Avoid placing weights directly on the floor. Please utilize the mats.
rules.rule7: Return your weights and dumbbells to their designated spots after use.
rules.rule9: Please open the windows 15 minutes before your workout ends and ensure they are closed afterwards.
rules.rule10: Ensure to turn off the lights after your workout.
